name: ecommerce-analyzer
description: Professional e-commerce website analyzer with smart auto-categorization for XAMPP localhost

scripts.start: echo "🚀 Starting E-commerce Analyzer for XAMPP..." && echo "📁 Make sure your backend files are in: C:\xampp\htdocs\project\backend" && echo "🌐 Frontend will be available at: http://localhost:5173" && echo "🔧 Backend should be accessible at: http://localhost/project/backend/process.php" && echo "" && npm run dev
